/**
     * @SWG\Get(
     *     path="/posts/{id}",
     *     summary="Gets a specific post by ID",
     *     tags={"Posts"},

     *     @SWG\Response(response=400, description="Invalid request")
     * )
     */

     * )
     */

     */
